name: authgear
description: Authgear is a full-featured authentication service for web and mobile apps with JWT, WebAuthn, OAuth, passwordless login, and multi-factor security. It provides UI and APIs and can be self-hosted in production.
features: Full Authentication: Complete auth service for web and mobile apps. Everything you need.
JWT Support: Modern token-based authentication. Secure and scalable.
WebAuthn: Passwordless login with biometrics and security keys. Future of auth.
OAuth & OIDC: Standard protocol support for integrations. Universal compatibility.
Multi-Factor Auth: Add extra security layers easily. Enhanced protection.
Passwordless Login: Email and SMS magic links. Frictionless access.
Production Ready: Battle-tested for self-hosted deployments. Reliable service.
Developer APIs: Comprehensive APIs for custom integration. Build anything.
